name: Bestia
description: As a newcomer wandering the foodscape of Los Angeles, stepping into Bestia felt like crossing into a culinary sanctuary. The moment you're greeted with the scent of Chef Specials, you know this isn't just another stop on your map‚Äîit's a destination. What truly stands out? The reviews speak for themselves: 'Inventive Italian dishes with an industrial vibe.' This isn't just a repeated chorus‚Äîit's the lived experience of diners who've come before you, and one you're likely to echo after your first bite.
reviewSummary: Inventive Italian dishes with an industrial vibe.

name: n/naka
description: As a newcomer wandering the foodscape of Los Angeles, stepping into n/naka felt like crossing into a culinary sanctuary. The moment you're greeted with the scent of Tasting menu and Kaiseki, you know this isn't just another stop on your map‚Äîit's a destination. What truly stands out? The reviews speak for themselves: 'Modern kaiseki dining, 13-course seasonal tasting menu.' This isn't just a repeated chorus‚Äîit's the lived experience of diners who've come before you, and one you're likely to echo after your first bite.
reviewSummary: Modern kaiseki dining, 13-course seasonal tasting menu.
